byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: Madison Square Garden Company confirms it will separate its sports and live entertainment division from its regional sports networks in order to streamline operations; sports and entertainment entity will consist of New York Knicks, New York Liberty, New York Rangers and Radio City Music Hall, while media business will include MSG Network and other broadcast operations.
lead_paragraph: One company will include the sports teams, the namesake arena and Radio City Music Hall, while the other will have regional sports networks.

headline.main: Madison Square Garden Confirms Plan to Split in Two
headline.print_headline: Madison Square Garden to Split Into 2 Companies

snippet: One company will include the sports teams, the namesake arena and Radio City Music Hall, while the other will have regional sports networks.
